problems.title: Check if String Has All Unique Characters
problems.description:
Check if the given string has all unique characters (no character repeats). Print "true" if all characters are unique, otherwise print "false".

Input Format:
First line contains a string.

Output Format:
Print "true" if all characters are unique, otherwise print "false".
problems.examples:
Sample Input
abc

Sample Output
true

Sample Input
hello

Sample Output
false

Explanation:
"abc" has all unique characters. "hello" has 'l' repeated, so it's false.
hintsList: Use a set to track seen characters. If a character is already in set, return false. Otherwise, add it to set.
